title: Installer: curl|sh install script
description: DoD: Add a documented install script (no root) for macOS+Linux that installs the ackchyually binary to ~/.local/bin (or user-chosen prefix), creates ~/.local/share/ackchyually dirs, and prints post-install shell PATH guidance. Script should download a pinned release artifact (from GitHub releases) and fail safely.

title: Pages: deploy ackchyually.sh
description: DoD: Add a GitHub Actions workflow that builds the static site and deploys it to GitHub Pages (or gh-pages branch), with least-privilege permissions. Document how to preview/build locally.

title: Docs: website + install documentation
description: DoD: Update README/docs to link the website, explain installation options (script/manual), and document where shims + DB live (~/.local/share/ackchyually).

title: Beads: bd create --parent cannot create multiple children
description: Repro: run 'bd create --parent EPIC_ID ...' twice. First succeeds (creates EPIC_ID.1). Second fails with 'issue EPIC_ID.1 already exists' instead of creating EPIC_ID.2. Workaround: create issues normally and add parent-child deps via 'bd dep add CHILD EPIC_ID --type parent-child'.

title: Beads: bd ready ignores blocks dependencies
description: Observed: issue with 'blocks' deps still appears in 'bd ready'. Example: ackchyually-dp5 has blocks deps on ackchyually-dp5.1/ackchyually-10/11/12 (see bd show), but bd ready still lists ackchyually-dp5 as ready. Expected: blocked issues excluded from ready output.

title: Beads: bd blocked returns empty despite blocked issues
description:
Observed: after ✓ Updated issue: ackchyually-dp5, ackchyually-dp5 [P0] [epic] blocked - Epic: Website + installer + Pages shows the issue but 
✨ No blocked issues prints 'No blocked issues'. Expected: bd blocked should list blocked issues.
